description:
11.251 telecine
Apply telecine process to the video.

This filter accepts the following options:



Some typical patterns:

NTSC output (30i):
27.5p: 32222
24p: 23 (classic)
24p: 2332 (preferred)
20p: 33
18p: 334
16p: 3444

PAL output (25i):
27.5p: 12222
24p: 222222222223 ("Euro pulldown")
16.67p: 33
16p: 33333334
name: telecine

parameters.description:
‘top, t’

top field first

‘bottom, b’

bottom field first The default value is top.
parameters.name: first_field

parameters.description: A string of numbers representing the pulldown pattern you wish to apply. The default value is 23.
parameters.name: pattern

source:
11.251 telecine

Apply telecine process to the video.

This filter accepts the following options:

first_field
‘top, t’

top field first

‘bottom, b’

bottom field first The default value is top.

pattern

A string of numbers representing the pulldown pattern you wish to apply. The default value is 23. 

Some typical patterns:

NTSC output (30i):
27.5p: 32222
24p: 23 (classic)
24p: 2332 (preferred)
20p: 33
18p: 334
16p: 3444

PAL output (25i):
27.5p: 12222
24p: 222222222223 ("Euro pulldown")
16.67p: 33
16p: 33333334
